1.0.name: wordpress/posts-in-sidebar
1.0.description: This plugin creates a new widget for your sidebar. In this widget you can display a list of post from a given author and/or category and/or tag. You can also display the featured image, the tags and also a link to the archive page. A bunch of useful options are also available.
